Large and renovated 3 Bedroom apartment just 3 blocks from the beautiful Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and Prospect Park.
This apartment is located around the corner from the 2/3/4/5 Subway lines and is just a short walk to the B/Q lines for quick access around the city. It is also near many trendy Bars, Cafes and restaurants.
This apartment includes:
- Bedrooms with lots of Windows for great Sunlight - Modern Kitchen with Stainless steel appliances including Dishwasher and Microwave - Large Living/Dining room - Large tiled Bathroom with Large soaking tub, Vanity and Mirror - Tons of closet space throughout - Heat and Hot water included - Laundry next door to building with option to drop off
One Month Fee due at signing. Good credit and income required Guarantors welcome!
Feel free to contact us with any questions or to schedule a showing!

4 Bed 1.5 Bath for a great price! No Fee!
-garden outside building -Laundry in building -Central Air ? AC/Heat -Beautiful kitchen with kitchen island -Dishwasher -Built-in Microwave -Roof access (nice views) -Hardwood floor -High ceiling -Ample closet space Walking distance to Prospect Park!
Located off the 2, 5, B, and Q trains, as well as B35, B44, and B49 bus routes. Tons of restaurants and stores nearby

details.description:
This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling. You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas.
Experience that side of life while also keeping that lovely community feel of the slightly more residential and peaceful Queens existence. You can have it both ways! Now top that all off with the fact this quiet building only has 6 units!! *long exhale* now that's the right choice. Conveniently located off the M and L trains, as well as the B13, B20, B38, and Q39, and Q58 bus lines.
Pet Friendly No Fee First and security to move in!

amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description: BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.UNIT FEATURES:Hardwood FloorsStainless Steel KitchenDishwasher; MicrowaveCentral A/C; HeatInquire for Private Balconies!Inquire for IN UNIT laundry!BUILDING FEATURES:Roof DeckLaundry RoomFitness CenterRec RoomTenant LoungePackage RoomBike StoragePets AllowedFirst; SecurityNO BROKER FEE!

details.description: Virtual tours available!Beautiful 4 bed / 2 bath apartment in Bed-Stuy, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Diamond Reef, L'Antagoniste, Peaches Hot House, Saraghina, Chez Oskar, Oaxaca Tacos, The Wilky, Essence, Bed-Wyne Cocktail, Casablanca Cocktail Lounge, Dynaco. Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods

Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
No brokers fee! Available 7/1

Lovely 3 bedroom 1 bath in prime Bushwick!
Queen sized rooms with closets and windows. Central heat/ac, recent renovations, and stainless steel appliances ? dishwasher included! Shared roof deck with Manhattan views !

Nestled right between Morningside Park and St Nicholas Park, this West Harlem location is pretty hard to beat! A perfect blend of convenience and community with new independent coffee roasters, must-have shopping destinations, and the historic Apollo theater all sharing a block right in your backyard!Conveniently located off the A, B, C, D, 1 and 2 trains, as well as the M2, M3, M4, M7, M10, and M104 bus routes. Wow! You can truly get anywhere, not that you'll want to leave ;)Hardwood FloorsStainless Steel KitchenDishwasher; MicrowaveCentral A/C; HeatPet Friendly!First;SecurityNO FEE

A unique modern oasis tucked away in Bushwick just 3 blocks from the Jefferson L train. Large queen-sized bedrooms with large windows; closets. Roof deck Laundry in building Dishwasher Shared Outdoor space

details.description:
Some of BedStuy's absolute best restaurant, bar, and coffee choices are right here off Bedford-Nostrand! This lively neighborhood will cater to all of your needs and more. With Herbert Von King park just down the street, bodegas on every other corner where they'll know you by name, and beautiful brownstones lining the streets, you get to enjoy the true history and culture of BedStuy, Brooklyn. Not to mention FULL SIZE grocers to both your right and your left, reallyyy upping the NYC convenience level!
Conveniently located right off the G train as well as the B38, B43, B44, and B52 bus routes.
FEATURES: Washer/Dryer IN UNIT! Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Pet Friendly

details.description:
It sounds like you've found an incredible space in Gowanus! This large 3-bedroom duplex w/ basement with back deck. Let's dive into the details:
This duplex boasts two levels of spacious living:
Upstairs, you'll find three well-appointed bedrooms, each with its own closet, alongside an open kitchen/living area and a full bathroom. Downstairs, the large basement offers two additional rooms and a convenient half bath, along with the added bonus of PRIVATE BACKYARD! The apartment is equipped with central A/C and heat, a dishwasher, and WASHER/DRYER IN UNIT!
Nestled between 3rd and 4th Aves in Gowanus, the location couldn't be more convenient. Just steps from the Union Street R station, with easy access to Atlantic Ave-Barclays (2/3/4/5/B/D/N/Q/R) and Bergen; Carroll St (F/G) stations, commuting is a breeze. Plus, you'll have a wealth of shops, restaurants, and bars right at your doorstep.
This duplex offers the perfect blend of space, comfort, and convenience. Don't miss out?schedule a viewing today!

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Duplex, Roof Access, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Private Outdoor Space

details.description: This apartment sounds like a dream! With brand new appliances and a spacious kitchen featuring a dishwasher and kitchen island, cooking and entertaining would be a breeze. The fact that each bedroom has a queen-sized bed, ensuite bathroom, standard-sized closet, and big window ensures comfort and convenience for everyone living there. Plus, having central AC and laundry in the building are huge bonuses. And with easy access to public transportation and plenty of nearby amenities like bars, cafes, and restaurants, it seems like the perfect blend of comfort and convenience!

Stunning 4-Bedroom, 2-Bath Apartment in a Modern Building! Each bedroom is spacious enough to accommodate a queen-sized bed and a small desk. The large living room boasts beautiful exposed brick. The modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. Conveniently located near numerous shops and cafes.
Highlights:
Central Air Conditioning Virtual Doorman Exposed Brick In-Building Laundry Rooftop Deck

Stunning 5 Bed / 5 Bath Apartment!
Discover this exceptional 5-bedroom apartment, where each bedroom boasts its own private bathroom. The apartment features a spacious common area with an open kitchen design, including a kitchen island and an in-unit washer and dryer. The building offers fantastic amenities such as a shared rooftop deck and a beautiful garden, perfect for relaxation. Nestled on a serene block in Gowanus, this location is just a short walk to the F, G, N, W, R, and D subway lines.
AMENITIES:
High Ceilings Hardwood Floors In-unit Washer and Dryer Outdoor Space Shared Backyard Roof Access Eat-In Kitchen Stainless Steel Appliances Dishwasher Central A/C
